review: I had a single lung transplant in September of 2020. In December on ‘21 There was a A fungal infection in my new lung. Voriconazole was prescribed, 1st I had like an ‘acid trip’ ocular disturbances + auditory & visual hallucinations after 4 days they stopped it and I am a lower dose now,. I take many drugs to keep me alive that have weighed heavily on me.
